title: (x) Aramark logo - Optima {Mike D}
content:
Any help, even close typefaces would be greatly appreciated.  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/logo_6723.jpg)
author: jonbruns

comments.content: I think there may be slight serifs on the logo. But that is pretty close. Thanks.

Hi there:

Looks like a modified Optima Black Italic.

You can see it here:

[http://www.linotype.com/13766/optimablackitalic-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403074010/http:/www.linotype.com/13766/optimablackitalic-font.html)

Mikey :-)
